Class MatrixFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.linearalgebra.matrices.MatrixFactory
public final class MatrixFactory extends Object
Factory for creating matrices with specific storage layouts. * @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

  • Method Details

    • identity

      public static <E> Matrix<E> identity(int size, Field<E> field)
      Creates an identity matrix of the specified size.
      Parameters:
      size - the dimension of the matrix
      field - the field of elements
      Returns:
      a new Identity Matrix instance

    • dense

      public static <E> DenseMatrix<E> dense(Class<E> elementClass, int rows, int cols)
      Creates a zero-initialized dense matrix of the specified dimensions. Convenience method for Real matrices.
      Parameters:
      elementClass - the class of elements (e.g., Real.class)
      rows - number of rows
      cols - number of columns
      Returns:
      a new mutable DenseMatrix instance

    • create

      public static <E> Matrix<E> create(E[][] data, Field<E> field)
      Creates a matrix with automatic storage selection (AUTO).
      Parameters:
      data - the data in row-major order (2D array)
      field - the field of elements
      Returns:
      a new Matrix instance

    • create

      public static <E> Matrix<E> create(E[][] data, Field<E> field, MatrixFactory.Storage storageType)
      Creates a matrix with the specified storage layout.
      Parameters:
      data - the data in row-major order (2D array)
      field - the field of elements
      storageType - the desired storage layout
      Returns:
      a new Matrix instance

    • create

      public static <E> Matrix<E> create(List<List<E>> data, Field<E> field)
      Creates a matrix with automatic storage selection (AUTO) from a List of Lists.
      Parameters:
      data - the data (List of Lists)
      field - the field of elements
      Returns:
      a new Matrix instance

    • create

      public static <E> Matrix<E> create(List<List<E>> data, Field<E> field, MatrixFactory.Storage storageType)

      Parameters:
      data - the data (List of Lists)
      field - the field of elements
      storageType - the desired storage layout
      Returns:
      a new Matrix instance
